edu.wpi.disco

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.disco.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent, User

    public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for entities that execute actions and utterances. An actor may participate in multiple interactions.
    See Also:
    Interaction

        Thread-safe method to generate tasks for this actor.

      • respond

        public final boolean respond(Interaction interaction,
              boolean ok,
              boolean guess)
        Thread-safe method to take a turn in given interaction. Note: Actor should call Interaction.done(boolean,Task,Plan) as each task in turn is executed.
        Parameters:
        ok - say "Ok" to end turn if nothing else to say (extension for game)
        guess - guess decompositions
        Returns:
        true if some response was made
        See Also:
        Interaction

      • synchronizedRespond

        protected abstract boolean synchronizedRespond(Interaction interaction,
                          boolean ok,
                          boolean guess)

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized()
        Test whether this actor is pre-authorized to perform all primitive tasks (unless specifically rejected) without asking for permission. Default true.
        See Also:
        isAuthorized(Plan, Interaction)

      • setAuthorized

        public void setAuthorized(boolean authorized)
        Authorize this actor to perform all primitive tasks in all interactions (unless specifically rejected) without asking for permission.

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized(Plan plan,
                   Interaction interaction)
        Test whether this actor is authorized to perform given plan in given interaction. Optional steps are not authorized, unless they are user utterances (for TTSay menu).
        See Also:
        isAuthorized(), isAuthorized(Task,Interaction), Task.getShould()

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized(Task task,
                   Interaction interaction)
        Test whether this actor is authorized to perform given task in given interaction. Returns true for utterances and false for non-primitive tasks.
        See Also:
        isAuthorized(), isAuthorized(Plan,Interaction), Task.getShould()

      • isSelf

        public boolean isSelf(Task task,
             Interaction interaction)
        Test whether given task must be performed by this actor in given interaction. Always return false for non-primitive tasks.

      • isOther

        public boolean isOther(Task task,
              Interaction interaction)
        Test whether given task must be performed by other actor in given interaction. Always return false for non-primitive tasks.

      • canSelf

        public boolean canSelf(Task task,
              Interaction interaction)
        Test whether given task can be performed by this actor in given interaction. Always return false for non-primitive tasks.
        See Also:
        Task.canUser(), Task.canSystem()

      • canOther

        public boolean canOther(Task task,
               Interaction interaction)
        Test whether given task can be performed by other actor in given interaction. Always return false for non-primitive tasks.
        See Also:
        Task.canUser(), Task.canUser()

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
